trans-unit.source: Select the type of activity that established the relation between the authority record and the resource.
trans-unit.target: Odaberi vrstu aktivnosti koja je uspostavila vezu između normiranog zapisa i resursa.

trans-unit.source: This is a duplicate of record %1%
Contains a unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies a resource.
trans-unit.target: Sadržava jedinstven standardni broj ili kod, koji nedvosmisleno identificira resurs.

trans-unit.source: A word, phrase, character, or group of characters, normally appearing in a resource, that names it or the work contained in it. Choice and format of titles should be governed by a content standard such as the Anglo-American Cataloging Rules, 2nd edition (AACR2), Cataloguing Cultural Objects (CCO), or Describing Archives: A Content Standard (DACS). Details such as capitalization, choosing among the forms of titles presented on an item, and use of abbreviations should be determined based on the rules in a content standard. One standard should be chosen and used consistently for all records in a set.
trans-unit.target: Riječ, izraz, znak ili grupa znakova koji se obično pojavljuju u resursu, koji određuju njegovo ime ili djelo koje se u njemu nalazi. Izbor i format naslova trebali bi se regulirati standardom sadržaja kao što su Pravila angloameričkih kataloga, 2. izdanje (AACR2), Katalogiziranje kulturnih objekata (CCO) ili Opisivanje arhiva: Standard sadržaja (DACS). Pojedinosti kao što su velika slova, odabir oblika naslova predstavljenih na komadima i upotreba kratica, trebaju se odrediti na osnovi pravila u standardu sadržaja. Treba odabrati jedan standard i dosljedno ga koristiti za sve zapise u kompletu.

trans-unit.source: Add new name and/or origin info
trans-unit.target: Dodaj novo ime i/ili podatke izvora

trans-unit.source: A term that specifies the characteristics and general type of content of the resource. Assign as many types as are applicable. The Type of resource options are limited to the values in the MODS typeOfResource top-level element.
trans-unit.target: Pojam koji određuje karakteristike i opću vrstu sadržaja resursa. Dodijeli što više primjenjivih vrsta. Opcije vrste resursa ograničene su na vrijednosti u MODS typeOfResource elementu najviše razine.

trans-unit.source: Add new child levels (if describing a collection)
trans-unit.target: Dodaj nove podređene razine (ako se opisuje zbirka)

trans-unit.source: Use these two fields to add lower levels to a collection-level description. Click Add new to add as many child levels as necessary. Identifer: enter a unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource. Title: enter A word, phrase, character, or group of characters, normally appearing in a resource, that names it or the work contained in it.
trans-unit.target: Koristi ova dva polja za dodavanje nižih razina opisu na razini zbirke. Pritisni „Dodaj novo” za dodavanje potrebnih podređenih razina. Identifikator: upiši jedinstveni standardni broj ili kôd koji identificira resurs. Naslov: upiši riječ, izraz, znak ili grupu znakova koji se obično pojavljuju u resursu, koji određuju njegovo ime ili djelo koje se u njemu nalazi.

trans-unit.source: A designation of the language in which the content of a resource is expressed. Select as many languages as required.
trans-unit.target: Oznaka jezika sadržaja resursa. Odaberi koliko god jezika je potrebno.

trans-unit.source: A term or phrase representing the primary topic(s) on which a work is focused. Search for an existing term in the Subjects taxonomy by typing the first few characters of the term name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new subject term.
trans-unit.target: Pojam ili izraz koji predstavlja primarnu temu/teme djela. Traži postojeći pojam u taksonomiji predmeta upisivanjem prvih nekoliko znakova imena. Alternativno, upiši i stvori novo ime te ga poveži s novim pojmom predmeta.

trans-unit.source: Search for an existing term in the Places taxonomy by typing the first few characters of the term name. Alternatively, type a new term to create and link to a new place term.
trans-unit.target: Traži postojeći pojam u taksonomiji mjesta upisivanjem prvih par slova pojma. Alternativno, upiši i stvori novi pojam te ga poveži s novim pojmom mjesta.

trans-unit.source: "Choose provenance, author and other non-subject access points from the archival description, as appropriate. All access points must be apparent from the archival description to which they relate." (RAD 21.0B) The values in this field are drawn from the Authorized form of name field in authority records. Search for an existing name by typing the first few characters of the name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new authority record.
Information about restrictions imposed on access to a resource. See MODS accessCondition top-level element for more information on how to use this field.
trans-unit.target: Podaci o ograničenjima koja su nametnuta dostupnosti resursa. Pogledaj element najviše razine MODS uvjeta dostupnosti (accessCondition) za više informacija o tome kako koristiti ovo polje.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the institution or repository holding the resource. Search for an existing repository name by typing the first few letters of the name. ALternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new repository record.
trans-unit.target: Određuje ustanovu ili repozitorij koji drže resurs. Traži postojeće ime repozitorija upisivanjem prvih par slova imena. Alternativno, upiši i stvori novo ime te ga poveži s novim zapisom repozitorija.

trans-unit.source: An abstract, table of contents or description of the resource's scope and contents.
trans-unit.target: Sažetak, kazalo ili opis opsega i sadržaja resursa.
